features: Durable Construction: CleanAide dustpan is made with high quality PET fibers. Handheld broom and dustpan are made with an ergonomically designed non- slip grip to provide maximum comfort and control
Convenient Storage: Both the handheld broom and dustpan have a hanging loop, making storage compact and efficient. Handheld broom handle snaps firmly into dustpan, making storage even easier

Effective Clean Up: Soft molded lip picks up maximum debris with minimal residue left behind. Built in scraper and teeth on dustpan to easily clean broom. Clean pet hair and human hair with one pull on the teeth
Multi Purpose: Helps clean up any size mess, anywhere. Suitable for tables, desks, keyboards, cars, cabinets, closets, sofas, pet cages, and more
Quick and Easy: Made with long-lasting brush bristles, designed to capture and pickup dirt effectively. Wide dustpan lip allows for maximum surface contact, leaving behind no debris

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CleanAide Snap On Dust Pan & Broom Kit

It utilizes long-lasting brush bristles designed to capture and pick up dirt effectivelyClean pet and human hair with one pull on the teethLightweight and convenient, clean with less effort This set can tackle any size mess—made with high-quality PET fibers, designed with a non-slip grip to provide maximum comfort and controlThe CleanAide dustpan and brush set has a built-in scraper with teeth to clean the broom easier The wide dustpan lip allows maximum surface contact, leaving no debris behind and making cleaning a breezeThe soft molded lip will allow for maximum cleaning with minimal hassleThe hand broom snaps firmly into the dustpan for easy storage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps dirt from going under it
reviews.reviewText: It’s a well designed little product. It’s all about the flexible rubbery strip extending out beneath the scoop that makes a kind if seal with the floor, even if uneven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to clean with
reviews.reviewText: Love this dust pan and broom. Super easy to use, the snap on feature sometimes comes easily undone and it falls, but overall great product. Necessary if you only have one certain area to clean and don't need to vacuum the whole floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: There is nothing I wouldn't recommend about this kit. It's. small and can be easily stored and cleaned. I do with the dustpan were better at catching small things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love the little brush - so much easier than trying to maneuver a broom to sweep the dust pile into the pan.Sturdy and adequately sized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Does NOT Interlock
reviews.reviewText: I discovered immediately that the brush handle does NOT stay attached to the pan at all! Not "Interlocking" as stated. Works fine otherwise but if that is important to you make another choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good brush, flimsy and misshapen pan.
reviews.reviewText: I like these handheld dust pans for cleaning small messes, and I've been unhappy with both my Libman and O-Cedar brand ones. The Libman one has a brush that shaped like a paint brush, and it's inefficient for sweeping under furniture or around corners. The O-Cedar brush handle falls off the brush head, and needs to be glued. Neither of them properly lock the brush onto the pan for hanging storage, despite supposedly being able to.I chose this set in hopes of upgrading my other two, but it unfortunately also leaves something to be desired.I find the brush optimal for my purposes in that it's shaped to my liking- the bristles are stiff and easy to clean against the serrated edge of the dust pan, it clips securely into the dust pan, and so far no bristles have come loose on me.However the dust pan is one of the worst I've ever used. It's thin and easily bent, and it's malformed. The pan domes upwards in the middle, the outer edge to sweep into bows upwards and doesn't fully meet the floor unless I press hard on it. Since the pan is so easily bent, pressing down hard on it will make the edge fully meet with the floors. However this still leaves the problem of the pan's interior being warped and preventing dust, dirt, and whatever else dirtying up the floors from being effectively swept into the pan and staying inside while sweeping.If the pan issue were to be fixed, I would be satisfied with this set.CleanAide Snap On Dust Pan & Broom Kit, Blue & White, 2 Pieces
